data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Castries to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Castries, Saint Lucia
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Castries, Saint Lucia, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 5 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Castries, Saint Lucia to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 53,707 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Castries, Saint Lucia.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Castries
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Castries, Castries, Saint Lucia.
Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Castries, Saint Lucia.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 11,993 believers in Castries to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the state of Castries.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.
